tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization (
    Warehouse_ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Storage_Area VARCHAR(50),
    Max_Capacity DECIMAL,
    Current_Inventory DECIMAL,
    Layout_Type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE storage_area (
    area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    warehouse_id INT,
    area_name VARCHAR(255),
    capacity FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES warehouse_capacity(warehouse_id)
);

CREATE TABLE usage_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES storage_area(area_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product(product_id)
);
